pullrequest.title: Use direct API call to Scene::SetPoseMsg to update poses from physics for server-side rendering

content.raw:
> Alternatively we could overload the function and deprecate the one that doesn't take a std::function?

I'm ok with adding the default parameter on Gazebo 11. But it looks like this could be backported if we overloaded the functions, right? Just something to keep in mind.
content.html:
Alternatively we could overload the function and deprecate the one that doesn't take a std::function?

I'm ok with adding the default parameter on Gazebo 11. But it looks like this could be backported if we overloaded the functions, right? Just something to keep in mind.
